sentences.sContent: Really? I should untie the necktie right now.
sentences.sContent_eng: Really? I should untie the necktie right now.
sentences.sCn: 真的吗？那我还是赶紧把领带解了。

sentences.sContent: If I’m the one winning every time I deal, I end up with a Colombian necktie, know what I’m sayin’?
sentences.sContent_eng: If I’m the one winning every time I deal, I end up with a Colombian necktie, know what I’m sayin’?
sentences.sCn: 如果每次发牌都是我赢的话，我会被他们哥伦比亚人用领带勒死的，你懂我意思吧？

sentences.sContent: Croatia also has a place in the history of neckwear as the origin of the necktie (cravat).
sentences.sContent_eng: Croatia also has a place in the history of neckwear as the origin of the necktie (cravat).
sentences.sCn: 克罗地亚同时也是一个拥有领带历史的国度，它成为领带（领结）的发源地。
